item.title: Donater item , i need help , good help
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

this isn’t a spoonfeeding community im not going to give the exact code he has to do part of it himself. also by looking at what you told him to add if donator = 1 wield = true} else } sM("You must be a donator to wield this item"); that would never work. you tell me to learn java look at what you said: that will probs give errors cos im new at coding but something along them lines.

your code would give 100 errors as you don’t have any closing brackets and the bracket on else is wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Donater item , i need help , good help
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:3, topic:278481”][code]if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == itemid && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”))
{
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
sm(“only for donators”);
PoisonPlayer();

sM not sm. Plus that poisons a player… that isnt anything to do with donators. thats if they dont have ur name it removes the item. go learn java.
}[/code][/quote]

Read full topic
